OpenStreetMap

OpenStreetMap in QGIS: Wiki

GPS data

Using smartphones or GPS devices we are able to collect data on the field and upload them into GIS. Quantum gis has different plugin for this.

Airborne imagery

Lidar data from aerial ported sensors are a very common and used imagery. LiDAR have resolutions of meters and is very usefull for sitre planning. In the terrain modelling and hydrological modelling session we are going to explore such datasets.

  • LiDar data repository in Missoury

Aerial images like Bing is a very usefull layer to locate objects on the field. Bings has also a license
